OM Reports M Reports are now online To obtain your reports please take the following steps Go to Infobases Open Knowledge Management Enter you NT logon and password Live Link will open From scrolldown Choose ENA Budget Planning Choose Energy Operations Choose your individual group Choose Budget vs Actual Comparison Report These files have been updated to include the correct yeartodate balances These amounts now accurately reflect the balances in the SAP system All information related to your group should be included in these files Please let me know if you have any additional questions Thanks so much Holly X

REper your cost center being reclassed for Susan Scott for March th Irena Forwarded by Irena D HoganHOUECT on AM From Johnnie nronXgate on PM To Gwendolyn NRON cc Veronica nronXgate Irma nronXgate Irena D CT Subject RE This transaction was sent to the Associate Analyst inbox thanks Johnnie Perry To ENW SAP Data Entry cc Subject Transfer Initiation Form sent by Irena Hogan of Energy Operations GENERAL INFORMATION Personnel number is P Name is Susan Scott Effective date is Company number and name is E Enron Networks Transfer Type Transfer within Operating Company TRANSFER INFORMATION Change position Reason lateral Job Name Analyst Old Position Name Enron Networks New Position Name Enron Americas Old Cost Center Number and Name Financail Desk New Cost Center Number and Name Financial Trading Old Organizational Name Risk Management New Organizational Name Commerical Trading Old Supervisor Name Errol McLaughlin New Supervisor Position Name Mike Grisby COMMENTS SUBMISSION INFORMATION Name Irena Hogan Org Unit Energy Operations

Officializing Risk Books Cc Forwarded by Irena D HoganHOUECT on AM Brent A Price AM To Irena D CT cc Subject Officializing Risk Books Irena Please forward to all in Risk Management In the last few weeks there have been numerous occasions in which certain risk books have not been officialized Most of these instances have been due to oversight one instance was at the direction of Commercial I want to reemphasise the importance of ensuring that all risk books are officialized at the end of the day This is the only mechanism we have to ensure that all trading positions are included in the Daily Position Report and daily trading limit calculations both of which are reviewed by top Enron management on a daily basis This must be a top priority for Risk Management and we need to do whatever we have to do to make sure we remember to perform this function at the end of every day Furthermore it is totally unacceptable for Commercial to direct any book administrator to not officialize a risk book If this occurs again and you are uncomfortable with dealing with the situation please inform your Desk Controller Steve Jackson or myself immediately and we will address the issue I realise every one of you has a lot on your plate and are working significant hours to get your jobs done However lets do what we have to do to make sure that this basic responsibility of Risk Management is performed every day without any exceptions Brent
Risk Management Staff Meetings Cc Beginning next Tuesday January Risk Management will resume having weekly staff meetings The EB location is and the time will remain the same AM Thank you Irena

Risk Management Staff Meeting for the Week of January Cc note The staff meeting for next week will not take place on Tuesday but as follows Thursday January AM AM EB Our staff meeting will resume as scheduled on Tuesday January Thank you

Meeting Room Location Cc takes place in EB Thank you Forwarded by Irena D HoganHOUECT on AM Jeffrey C Gossett AM To Kam CT Darron C CT William CT David CT Errol NRON cc Irena D CT Elizabeth CT Subject Meeting on systems There is a minute meeting every morning on the th floor at about systems issues from the prior night and to discuss what books were not officialized I have gone to this meeting this week and I think that we should always have a representative in the meeting Here is what I propose We alternate weeks going to this meeting Week of Dec Jeff Gossett Dec Darron Giron Dec David Baumbach Dec Will Kelly Jan Kam Keiser Jan Errol Mclaughlin And then we will start over again If you can not go make sure that someone goes in your place Thanks Irena and Elizabeth Can you please add these daily meetings to the appropriate calender Thanks

Officializing Risk Books Cc Forwarded by Irena D HoganHOUECT on AM Brent A Price AM To Irena D CT cc Subject Officializing Risk Books Irena Please forward to all in Risk Management In the last few weeks there have been numerous occasions in which certain risk books have not been officialized Most of these instances have been due to oversight one instance was at the direction of Commercial I want to reemphasise the importance of ensuring that all risk books are officialized at the end of the day This is the only mechanism we have to ensure that all trading positions are included in the Daily Position Report and daily trading limit calculations both of which are reviewed by top Enron management on a daily basis This must be a top priority for Risk Management and we need to do whatever we have to do to make sure we remember to perform this function at the end of every day Furthermore it is totally unacceptable for Commercial to direct any book administrator to not officialize a risk book If this occurs again and you are uncomfortable with dealing with the situation please inform your Desk Controller Steve Jackson or myself immediately and we will address the issue I realise every one of you has a lot on your plate and are working significant hours to get your jobs done However lets do what we have to do to make sure that this basic responsibility of Risk Management is performed every day without any exceptions Brent
